verses.text: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* precepts \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w must|strong="H0776"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt walk \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*, worshipped \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* shady \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*:

Overthrow \w their|strong="H8313"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w their|strong="H8313"\w* statues, \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w their|strong="H8313"\w* groves \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H8313"\w* \w idols|strong="H6456"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*: \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w their|strong="H8313"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H5088"\w* \w offer|strong="H2077"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* holocausts \w and|strong="H0935"\w* victims, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gifts|strong="H2077"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1062"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, whereunto \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* seemeth good \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w himself|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* \w present|strong="H5414"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* refit, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5117"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* without \w any|strong="H3605"\w* fear,

\w In|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* therein. Thither \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, holocausts, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* victims, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w choicest|strong="H4005"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gifts|strong="H2077"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* feast \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* menservants \w and|strong="H1121"\w* maid-servants, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H8179"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* \w part|strong="H0859"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thou \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* thy holocausts \w in|strong="H4725"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* sacrifices. \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H7535"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou desirest \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* delight thee, kill, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H8179"\w*: whether \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w having|strong="H5315"\w* blemish \w or|strong="H0398"\w* defect: \w or|strong="H0398"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* say, sound \w and|strong="H3068"\w* without blemish, \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* roe, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hart, shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w Only|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* thou shalt \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

Thou mayst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H6629"\w* thy \w towns|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy corn, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1062"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou vowest, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou wilt offer \w voluntarily|strong="H5071"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy manservant, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H8179"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* refreshed \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, whereunto thou shalt \w put|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H8104"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* thou \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* thou livest \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou wilt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* desireth:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w off|strong="H5414"\w*, thou shalt kill \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w towns|strong="H8179"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* pleaseth thee.

\w Even|strong="H3651"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* roe \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hart \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w both|strong="H3162"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w Only|strong="H7535"\w* beware \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* thou shalt \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*,
